title: New & Video: Vacationer – Trip
body:
![](http://a1.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/190233_119618781449489_110810965663604_137694_2295048_n.jpg "Vacationer")

It’s beginning to feel more like summer every day; the shorts are hastily pulled on, beers are chilling eagerly in the fridge and smiles are slowly forcing their way onto peoples faces. As well as these stereotypical insights, I’ve also noticed my musical tastes molding into more suitable sounds to fit the current weather. _Trip_ from **Vacationer** typifies this, a blissed out beauty of a summer hit, soulful, danceable and sure to get you into the mood for those long, hazy days ahead. Also be sure to check out the video for the fantastic track, which you can watch below.
